parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE. The post contains a CMF number: "CMF: 11240027".  This strongly suggests an intention to comply with electoral regulations, but the presence of a CMF alone doesn't automatically make the post compliant.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE. The post explicitly mentions "Partidul S.O.S. România" for the parliamentary elections and "Călin Georgescu" for the presidential elections.  This directly refers to specific candidates participating in the elections.  Article 36 (7) - a applies.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE. This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The message is not a private communication; it's intended for public consumption. </addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE. The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to vote for specific candidates in both the parliamentary and presidential elections. The phrasing "Cum votam pe 1 și 8 Decembrie?" directly asks how to vote, and then provides instructions. This clearly aims to influence voting behavior. Article 36 (7) - c applies.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE. The post lacks journalistic objectivity. It's not presenting news or analysis; it's directly advocating for specific candidates.  It's promotional material, not journalism.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE. The post doesn't express a personal opinion; it's a clear endorsement of candidates. The call to action is explicit and leaves no room for interpretation as a personal opinion.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>563009356458380</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to specific candidates (Partidul S.O.S. România and Călin Georgescu), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to support these candidates. The post's content is promotional, not journalistic.  The presence of a CMF, while suggesting an attempt at compliance, does not negate the promotional nature of the post.  The post's timing is also crucial; even if the presidential election is still ongoing, the parliamentary election propaganda period might have ended, making the recommendation to vote for SOS a violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Partidul S.O.S. România</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Călin Georgescu</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>ALVERNA CONNECT SRL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
ALVERNA CONNECT SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 563009356458380) care constituie propagandă electorală interzisă, având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea Partidului S.O.S. România la alegerile parlamentare și a lui Călin Georgescu la alegerile prezidențiale. Postarea, prin formularea directă „Cum votam pe 1 și 8 Decembrie?”, urmată de îndemnul explicit de a vota pentru candidații menționați, depășește limitele activității jurnalistice și are ca scop evident influențarea votului, încălcând astfel prevederile legale privind perioada de propagandă electorală. Prezența CMF-ului nu exonerează de răspundere, întrucât conținutul postării rămâne propagandă electorală.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
